titles.title: Turn Your Eyes Upon Jesus (chorus & verses)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Turn your eyes upon Jesus, Look full in His wonderful face, And the things of earth Will grow strangely dim In the light of His glory and grace.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Turn your eyes upon Jesus, Look full in His wonderful face, And the things of earth Will grow strangely dim In the light of His glory and grace. O soul, are you weary and troubled, No light in the darkness you see? There's light for a look at the Savior And life more abundant and free.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Through death into life everlasting He passed and we follow Him there. Over us sin no more hath dominion For more than conquerors we are.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}His Word shall not fail you He promised - Believe Him and all will be well. Then go to a world that is dying His perfect salvation to tell.{/lang-eng}
